unnormalised: SpiceJet flight SG 123 from Delhi to Mumbai was delayed… again! Scheduled to depart at 6:00 AM sharp on 20/10/2024, it’s now showing an estimated departure of 9:15 AM. Passengers are reportedly enjoying extra helpings of complimentary (questionable) chai.
normalised: SpiceJet flight S-G one hundred and twenty three from Delhi to Mumbai was delayed… again! Scheduled to depart at six zero zero A-M sharp on twentieth October two thousand and twenty four, it’s now showing an estimated departure of nine fifteen A-M. Passengers are reportedly enjoying extra helpings of complimentary (questionable) chai.

unnormalised: Apparently, the delay is due to “operational reasons,” which, as everyone knows, translates to “we forgot to fuel the plane, and the pilot is stuck in traffic.” One passenger, Mr. Sharma, was overheard saying, "I could have walked to Mumbai faster! And probably with less turbulence." He was scheduled to attend a very important meeting at 11:00 AM. Preponing the meeting seems like the only option.
normalised: Apparently, the delay is due to “operational reasons,” which, as everyone knows, translates to “we forgot to fuel the plane, and the pilot is stuck in traffic.” One passenger, Mister Sharma, was overheard saying, "I could have walked to Mumbai faster! And probably with less turbulence." He was scheduled to attend a very important meeting at eleven zero zero A-M. Preponing the meeting seems like the only option.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the Chennai-Coimbatore overnight express is running, surprise, surprise, 2 hrs behind schedule. So, if you thought you'd reach by 7:00 AM on 21/10/2024, you are sadly mistaken. You'll probably get there around 9:00 AM which is perfect timing to miss that super important presentation.
normalised: Meanwhile, the Chennai-Coimbatore overnight express is running, surprise, surprise, two hours behind schedule. So, if you thought you'd reach by seven zero zero A-M on twenty first October two thousand and twenty four, you are sadly mistaken. You'll probably get there around nine zero zero A-M which is perfect timing to miss that super important presentation.

unnormalised: On a brighter note, the local auto-rickshaw union has announced they will be "strictly adhering" to meter rates… on April Fool's Day, 01/04/2025. So, plan your journeys accordingly. At least we can rely on something to be consistently inconsistent.
normalised: On a brighter note, the local auto-rickshaw union has announced they will be "strictly adhering" to meter rates… on April Fool's Day, first April two thousand and twenty five. So, plan your journeys accordingly. At least we can rely on something to be consistently inconsistent.
